strapiPost.title: Bikeable Building in Bentonville
strapiPost.content:
The Ledger located in near downtown Bentonville adds a spin on the traditional bike to work routine

  • Info - The Ledger is a bikeable office building located in Downtown Bentonville that is set to open Q1 2022. It is located at 240 S Main Street, near the WMT Home Office.
  • The Ledger will be several stories tall that includes an exterior bikeable pathway up to your shared office space.
  • More information about the building or the space can be found HERE
